The dashboard shows an analysis of [ATFM delays](/definition/atfm-delay/) in the EUROCONTROL area. The underlying data is available for download in the [data section](/data/).

<small>Please note that the analysis may take a few moments to load. The dashboard is best viewed in Chrome or Firefox.</small>
